popover.primary: A mastery path focused on allies using Oath Runes to enhance your abilities.
A mastery path focused on powerful effects centered around your Master Rune.
A mastery path focused on dealind directly with your problems via healing or damage.

data.name: Alaric's Apprentice
data.description: Rune of Speed, Rune of Restoration, Rune of Regeneration, Rune of Fury, Blessing of Grimnir, and Rune of Battle cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 936 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestor's Blessing
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking, of all of your abilities will cost 15% less action points. While under the effects of your Rune of Balance, healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by 50. This effect will not work on yourself.

data.name: Ancestor's Echo
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Gain a 660 unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Blessing of Grimnir
data.description: Heals all groupmembers within 100 feet for X health.

data.name: Blessing of Valaya
data.description: You channel the power of the Drawven Goddess into your Master Rune. All groupmates within 100ft of it will be0 healed for X and will have all incoming healing increased by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Cleansing Vitality
data.description: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for X over 5 seconds if an effect was successfully removed. This can stack up to 5 times.

data.name: Concussive Runes
data.description: Your Rune of Cleaving now causes targets struck to take a X tactic penalty to elemental resistance and a Y tactic penalty to armor for 10s.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Efficient Runecarving
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking, each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt. While under the effects of your Rune of Balance, all of your abilities will build up 25% faster.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing, or disablling effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Grimnir's Fury
data.description: Deals X damage to your target and all enemies within 30ft of the target and restores Y health to all allies within 30 feet every half second for 3 seconds.

data.name: Grimnir's Gift
data.description: Grungni blesses your target, restoring X health.

data.name: Grimnir's Shield
data.description: You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Master Rune
data.note: You can only have 1 master rune active at a time.
data.description: Inscribes a Master Rune into the ground for 20 seconds. Every 2 seconds the rune will pulse dealing elemental damage to enemies within 30 feet and healing groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Mighty Immolation
data.description: Rune of Might will now apply Rune of Immolation to each target hit. The cooldowns of Rune of Might and Rune of Immolation are increased by 10 seconds.

data.name: Mountain Spirit
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet gain a 1320 morale bonus to armor and a 504 morale bonus to all resistances for 10 secons.

data.name: Oath Rune of Iron
data.description:
Grants the targeted group member gains an ability bonus of (2 * rank) to initiative and willpower for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to apply a Rune of Warding heal buff to themself or an ally.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Power
data.description:
Grants the target group member an ability bonus of (3 * rank) to strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to apply a Rune of Power damage buff to an enemy.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sanctuary
data.description:
Targeted group member gains a (2 * rank) ability bonus to toughness for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sharing Beer
data.description: Oath Runes you cast within the next 4 seconds will apply to all groupmates.

data.name: Oath Rune of Warding
data.description:
Grants targeted group member an ability bonus of X to all resistances for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to apply a Rune of Warding heal buff to themself or an ally.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: On Your Feet!
data.description: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for X health over 5 seconds and will restore 70 action points when the target is resurrected.

data.name: Protection of the Ancestors
data.description: Grants a X ability bonus to wounds to target groupmate for 30 seconds, healing them for the value fo the additional HP gained.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Regenerative Shielding
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has 25% chance to cause the target to gain a 250 tactic bonus to armor 10 seconds. Additionally, 20% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Rune of Battle
data.description: Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals X elemental damage to all enemies and heals allies for Y every 3 seconds within 30 feet for 15 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Binding
data.description: Wounds your target for X elemental damage and staggers them for 3 seconds, preventing all actions unlee they're damaged. If the target is under the effect of Rune of Power, they will take an additional Y elemental damage, the stagger will last 6 seconds, and the Rune of Power will be removed.

data.name: Rune of Breaking
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance bonuses from items into magic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your magic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance bonuses from items into healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance.

data.name: Rune of Burning
data.description:
You channel a powerful series of runes around you which project searing flame to enemies within 20 feet of you, dealing X elemental damage every 2 seconds over 3 seconds, and to all enemies within 30ft of your Master Rune, dealing Y elemental damage every second for 6 seconds.

This ability can be used while moving, and will end if you run out of action points.

data.name: Rune of Cleansing
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one curse or ailment. If the target is under the effect of Rune of Warding, two effect will be removed.

data.name: Rune of Cleaving
data.description: A burst of force errupts from your rune dealing X elemental damage over 10 seconds to the targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Ending
data.description: Deals 1144 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then heals all group members within 100 feet for all the damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Fire
data.description: Your rune releases a scorching blast, inflicting 318 elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Rune of Fury
data.description: Group mates within 100ft of your Master Rune gain 75 AP. This ability is not affected by cooldown reduction abilities.

data.name: Rune of Immolation
data.description: You set your target ablaze, burning them for X elemental damage over 15 seconds. Your Master Rune will damage twice per tick to targets under this effect.

data.name: Rune of Insanity
data.description: Deal 600 damage to target. Lower target's AP by 200.

data.name: Rune of Life
data.description: Resurrect target friendly dead player and restore 20% of their health.

data.name: Rune of Mending
data.description: Restores X health, then continues to restore Y health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Rune of Might
data.description: Your rune transmits a surge of power through the ground, dealing X elemental damage to all targets within 30 feet of you and within 30 feet of your Master Rune.

data.name: Rune of Nullification
data.description: All attacks against targets under the effect of Rune of Power and all critical attacks against any target place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Preservation
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Rune of Rebirth
data.description: Self heal for 1200 then an additional 2403 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Regeneration
data.description: You call upon a regenerative rune restoring X heatlth every over 20 seconds to your target. Your Master Rune will heal targets twice that are under this effect.

data.name: Rune of Restoration
data.description: Your rune infuses the target with vitality, restoring X health. If the target is under the effect of Rune of Warding, they will be healed again for half the value.

data.name: Rune of Serenity
data.description: Heals target for X health over 9 seconds, and will then bounce to and heal other allies within 30 feet of the previous target. This effect will not apply itself to the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

data.name: Rune of Shielding
data.description: A shielding rune which absorbs up to X damage over 10 seconds. If the target is under the Rune of Warding, the target recovers Z health as well.

data.name: Rune of Skewering
data.description: Deals 2288 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Speed
data.description: Heals your target for X. If the target is under the effect of Rune of Warding, they will gain 30% movement speed for 5 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Striking
data.description: Your rune calls down a bolt of electricity, dealing X elemental damage to your target. If the target is under the effect of a Rune of Power, this ability will ignore 50% of their resistances.

data.name: Rune of Sundering
data.description: Knockbacks targets within 30 feet of you. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Runic Blasting
data.description: You gain 25% critical damage against enemies under a Rune of Power. You gain a 25% critical healing chance on allies under the effect of Rune of Warding.

data.name: Spellbinding Rune
data.description: A potent rune which suppresses magic, silencing and wounding your target for X elemental damage over 4 seconds.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 300 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from stuns and knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to corporeal resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to elemental and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Sundered Motion
data.description: Rune of Sundering's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds and will now apply a 40% movement reduction for 10 seconds to all those hit.

data.name: Swift Runes
data.description: Cooldown on Rune of Cleansing is removed and the cost increased to 40 action points.

data.name: Thick-Skulled
data.description: Rune of Mending and Rune of Serenity can no longer be set back when casting.

data.name: Valaya's Shield
data.description: Heals your groupmates within 100 feet 1596 health over 15 seconds and gives 375 action points over 15 seconds
